creator: LBTA
title: AnimatedCircle
description: Ever wanted to integrate animation into your iOS applications? Struggled with learning about animation with the Swift language? Today's video will teach you how to use CABasicAnimation to animate a circular stroke with CAShapeLayer. Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: AnimationsWithConstraints
description: What always seems to be difficult for newcomers to Auto Layout is the implementation of animation with constraints. The trick is to capture your anchors with a local property, and modify it's active or constant properties.  Afterwards, you can call an animation block with layoutIfNeeded to begin animating to the new properties. Animating with constraints is especially useful to maintain view locations without having to recalculate CGRect values. Have fun.

creator: LBTA
title: Appstore
description: Today, we'll be looking at recreating the Apple AppStore application. And in doing so, we'll be able to take your iOS development skills to the next level by teaching you techniques to scroll horizontally in your cells.

creator: LBTA
title: Audible
description: Welcome to a brand new mini-series on how to build a Walkthrough/Onboarding/Login component.  In this short series of videos, I'll guide you through how to use a UICollectionView to page through several screens of content.

creator: LBTA
title: AutoTextViewSizing
description: Today's video will teach you how to implement a very easy trick to get your UITextView components to automatically size itself when the text changes.  Its reliable in most situations and isn't too difficult to understand compared to the many other techniques out there.

creator: LBTA
title: CADisplayLink
description: Creating your own animations is quite easy and simple using CADisplayLink once you understand what it does.  In today's lesson I'll teach you how to hook into the refresh rate of your display and execute some UI updating code.  In the end, we'll look at how to integrate animation duration to make it that much better. Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: ChainedAnimations
description: Let's learn how to chain animations together in today's lesson to achieve some stunning visual effects.  Nothing too hard, but you need to make sure you don't overdo it with animations.  Have fun.

creator: LBTA
title: FacebookLiveStream
description: Playing around with the Facebook Live Stream the other day, I found an interesting animation that I wanted to reproduce. In today's video, let's look at how to animate some images across the screen using a curved path. We'll be using a UIBezierPath to execute our animation.  After seeing it in action, let's also introduce some randomness to the various images that we add into our view.

creator: LBTA
title: FacebookPopup
description: Another amazing animation tutorial for folks looking to create some cool effects in their apps.  Today's video goes over UILongPressGestureRecognizer and transformations to get objects onto the screen.  Its a fun exercise and should teach you a bunch of different skills. Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: FacebookShimmer
description: Animations are awesome to build and even more fun to play around with when you get it working correctly.  In today's lesson we'll dive into how we can use a CAGradientLayer as a mask to achieve a Facebook Shimmer style animation.  Enjoy

creator: LBTA
title: FaceDetection
description: Face detection has been available through 3rd party APIs for a while now.  Finally we have native support for this feature using Vision APIs with Xcode 9 and Swift 4.  It can be somewhat tricky to translate the detected rectangles into screen image coordinates so in today's video I go through exactly how to use this API.  Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: GroupedMessages
description: A very common task in iOS is to provide auto sizing cells for UITableView components. In today's lesson we look at how to implement a custom cell that provides auto sizing using anchor constraints.  This technique is very easy and requires very little customization. Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: MagicalGrid
description: Today we figure out how to select the cells that are inside of our grid based on the location of our gesture. Then we take a look at an optimization that uses a HashMap also known as a Dictionary for our cells.

creator: LBTA
title: Twitter
description: Welcome to the introduction of a very exciting series on how to build out the Twitter application.  In today's video, we're going to go through very quickly how to build out the basic layout of our home feed. We'll be doing so using UICollectionViewController and rendering cells, a header, and a footer.

creator: LBTA
title: UIViewPropertyAnimatorBasics
description: Want to learn an advanced blur effect that you can apply to your application?  In this lesson we'll dig deep into some basics of working with UIViewPropertyAnimator to give us a gradual blur using UIVisualEffectView and UIBlurEffect.  Very interesting and hope you enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: Youtube
description: Today we'll start off this brand new series on how to build out the YouTube application for iOS.  I'll give you guys a quick demo of the application and some of the features/functionality that we'll be writing in Swift.  Sit back, relax, and enjoy this first lesson where we'll focus on building out the Home Feed portion of the app!

creator: LBTA
title: SwipeMatchFirestore
description: In this wonderful course, let's take an adventure into the land of creating a fun and interactive Swipe and Match user interface. In today's day and age of dating applications, you're almost guaranteed to find this style of interaction.

creator: LBTA
title: DrawSomething
description: Let's learn how to create a drawing application by implementing our own Canvas view. This canvas will implement tracking of our fingers through touchesBegan and touchesMoved.  It'll be a lot of fun and a brief escape from standard UITableView and UICollectionView components. Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: RetainCycleInstruments
description: Retain cycles are one of those pesky little bugs that can totally derail your app development process.  In today's quick lesson, I'll go through how you can use Instruments Profiler to detect retain cycles.  But before we do that, we actually have to create a retain cycle as a demo to showcase how this works.  Enjoy.

creator: LBTA
title: StretchyHeader
description: In this lesson, let's get the foundation of our Stretchy Header Collection View Controller built out.  We'll start by rendering out our cells, then our headers, and finally modify our layout's padding values to get our UI going.  The last step is to figure out how to get our custom image to show up underneath our status bar for the notches of newer iPhones such as the X, XS, and XS Max.

creator: Other
title: InteractiveSlideOutMenuLeftRight
description: InteractiveSlideOutMenuLeftRight

creator: Other
title: InteractiveSlideOutMenuUpDown
description: InteractiveSlideOutMenuUpDown

creator: Other
title: CustomNavigationControllerAnimation
description: CustomNavigationControllerAnimation

creator: LBTA
title: IntermediateTrainingCoreData
description: If you're looking to become an iOS developer or work on Front End Development, you're going to have to learn how to Create, Read, Update, and Delete objects. These four operations are referred to as CRUD operations in the software development world. Understanding how to pass objects around from screen to screen and perform updates and deletes to the database is an essential skill for any developer.

creator: LBTA
title: AppStoreJSONAPIs
description: An exciting new course on how to build out the AppStore application using various JSON APIs coming directly from Apple's iTunes Search API. We'll be cover many different topics involving how to construct the beautiful UI using UICollectionViews nested inside one another. Another great couple of topics I'll teach you is how to animate our views using child view controllers. And much much more!

creator: Other
title: CollectionViewStuff
description: Assorted collection view things that I have tried

creator: Other
title: CircularLoadingAnimation
description: CircularLoadingAnimation

creator: Other
title: BottomPopUpScreenTest
description: BottomPopUpScreenTest

title: CubeAnimation

title: TextExclusion
description: TextExclusion
